import React,{useState} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import './App.css'; const Update = ({i,id})=>{ const [newItem,setNewItem] = useState({ lname:i.lname, fname:i.fname, surname:i.surname, age:i.age, about:i.about }) const [input,setInput] = useState({ lname:"", fname:"", surname:"", age:"", about:"" }) const updateItem = (id)=>{ axios.put(`http://localhost:3002/Perso/${id}`,input).then(res=>{ console.log(res.data) }) } return(
Change

Nom {setInput({...input,lname:e.target.value})}} />
Prenom{setInput({...input,fname:e.target.value})}} />
Psudo {setInput({...input,surname:e.target.value})}} />
Age{setInput({...input,age:e.target.value})}} />
A propo{setInput({...input,about:e.target.value})}} />
) } export default Update
